title: May 2022 security patches are now available for these Samsung devices
content:
Over the last few days, Samsung has rolled out the Android security patches for May 2022 for quite a few of its devices. It started with its flagship Galaxy S22 series towards the end of last month, followed by the Galaxy Tab S8 series, the Galaxy Watch 4 series, and the Galaxy S21 series. Since

The post May 2022 security patches are now available for these Samsung devices appeared first on XDA.
description: Over the last few days, Samsung has rolled out the May 2022 security patches to a bunch of its devices. Here's a quick overview of all devices that have received the update so far.
